Module NewsManager
Package application

Class LoginModel

java.lang.Object
application.LoginModel
class LoginModel extends Object
This class provide the services needed to verify and grant users access to the news manager
Author:
agonzalez

  • Field Details

    • users

      private HashMap<String,User> users
      Map for authorized users. "User:pass" is the key for this map This map is only used with dummy data

    • dummyData

      private boolean dummyData
      If is true dummyData for users will be used

    • connectionManager

      private ConnectionManager connectionManager
      The ModelManager is used to communicate with articles server

    • setConnectionManager

      void setConnectionManager(ConnectionManager connection)
      Sect the connection manager. Connection manager is needed for using real data
      Parameters:
      connection - connection to be used in the login process

    • validateUser

      final User validateUser(String login, String passwd)
      Method for user validation. Override is not allowed
      Parameters:
      login - user id
      passwd - password for the user
      Returns:
      return the user if user id and password are correct. In other case return null
